divy23:8: ayaṁ tāvat khustikayā ekottarikayā dharmaṁ deśayati—amī bhikṣavo dharmakathikā yuṁktamutkamuktapratibhānāḥ |
divy23:9: kasmānnaitānadhyeṣayasi? sa tairabhihitah—mahalla, kiṁ tvayā adhigatam? sa kathayati—ekottarikā |
divy23:10: te kathayanti—tvaṁ tāvanmahalla khustikayā ekottarikayā dharmaṁ deśayasi |
divy23:12: kasmānnaitānadhyeṣayasi? sa kathayati—āryāḥ, yūyaṁ kasyārthe na deśayata? kimahaṁ nivārayāmīti? te kathayanti—nandopananda, prativadatyeṣo ’smākaṁ mahallaḥ |
divy23:14: sa saṁlakṣayati—yadi me utkṣepaṇīyaṁ karma kariṣyanti, nāgabhavane ’pyahamavakāśaṁ na lapsye |
divy23:15: sa teṣāṁ śayitakānāṁ taṁ vihāramantarhāpayitvā mahāsamudraṁ praviṣṭaḥ |
divy23:17: nandopananda, uttiṣṭha siṁhāsanaṁ prajñāpaya, dharmaṁ deśayāmaḥ |
divy23:18: te kathayanti—ko ’pyasau devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhagavatyabhiprasanno buddhe dharme saṁghe kārān kurvan, so ’smābhirviheṭhitaḥ |
divy23:20: bhagavānāha—yo ’sau bhikṣavo nirmito yadi ṣaḍvargikairbhikṣubhir na viheṭhito ’bhaviṣyat, yāvacchāsanakoṭimuddhāṭako buddhe dharme saṁghe kārānakariṣyat |
divy23:21: bhagavān saṁlakṣayati—yaḥ kaścidādīnavo bhikṣavaḥ, anadhīṣṭo dharmaṁ deśayati, tasmānna bhikṣuṇā^nadhīṣṭena dharmo deśayitavyaḥ |
divy23:25: śrāvastyāṁ buddharakṣito nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ |
divy23:27: sa tayā sārdhaṁ krīḍate ramate paricārayati |
divy23:28: tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṁvṛttā |
divy23:30: tena sa gṛhapatiḥ sapatnīkaḥ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratikṣṭhāpitaḥ |
divy23:31: apareṇa samayena sā tasya patnī āpannasattvā savṛttā |
divy23:32: āyuṣmāñ śāriputrastasya ca vaineyakālaṁ jñātvā ekākyeva tat kulamupasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy23:33: sa gṛhapatiḥ kathayati—nāstyāryaśāriputrasya kaścit paścācchramaṇah? sa kathayati—gṛhapate, kimasmākaṁ kāśadhānādvā kuśadhānādvā paścācchramaṇā bhavanti? api tu ye bhavadvidhānāṁ sakāśāllabhyante, asmākaṁ te paścācchramaṇā bhavanti |
divy23:34: buddharakṣito gṛhapatih—ārya, mama patnī āpannasattvā saṁvṛttā |
divy23:35: yadi putraṁ janayiṣyati, tamahamāryasya paścācchramaṇaṁ dāsyāmi |
divy23:38: sā aṣṭānāṁ vā navānāṁ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā |
divy23:39: dārako jāto ’bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṁgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ |
divy23:40: tasya jñātayaḥ saṁgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṁśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṁ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṁ vyavasthāpayanti—kiṁ bhavatu dārakasya nāma? ayaṁ dārako buddharakṣitasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ |
divy23:42: yasminneva divase saṁgharakṣito jātaḥ, tasminneva divase pañcānāṁ vaṇikśatānāṁ pañca putraśatāni jātāni |
divy23:44: saṁgharakṣito dāraka unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
divy23:46: yadā mahān samṛttaḥ, tadā āyuṣmāñ śāriputrastasya vaineyakālaṁ jñātvā ekākyeva tatkulamupasaṁkramya nimittamupadarśayitumārabdhaḥ |
divy23:47: buddharakṣitena gṛhapatinā saṁgharakṣito ’bhihitah—putra, ajāta eva tvaṁ mayā āryaśāriputrasya paścācchramaṇo datta iti |
divy23:48: caramabhavikaḥ sa āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa pravrājita upasampādita āgamacatuṣṭayaṁ ca grāhitaḥ |
divy23:50: athāpareṇa samayena tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudragamanīyaṁ paṇyaṁ samudānīya mahāsamudramavatartukāmāni kathayanti—kiṁcidvayaṁ bhavanta āryakamavatārayāma yo ’smākaṁ mahāsaudramadhyagatānāṁ dharmaṁ deśayiṣyati |
divy23:51: te kathayati—bhavantaḥ, ayamasmākamāryasaṁgharakṣito vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṁśukrīḍanakaḥ |
divy23:54: ārya saṁgharakṣita, tvamasmākaṁ vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṁśukrīḍanakaḥ |
divy23:60: upasaṁkramya kathayanti—ārya śāriputra, ayamasmākamāryasaṁgharakṣito vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṁśukrīḍanakaḥ |
divy23:62: eṣo ’pyasmābhiḥ sārdhamavataratu, asmākaṁ mahāsamudramadhyagatānāṁ dharmaṁ deśayiṣyati |
divy23:71: tatra bhagavān saṁgharakṣitamāmantrayate—gaccha saṁgharakṣita, bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā bhavitavyam |
divy23:74: atha tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni kṛtakautukamaṅgalasvastyayanāni śakṭairbhārairmūḍhaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṁ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṁ saṁprasthitāni |
divy23:75: te nipuṇataḥ samudrayānapātraṁ pratipadya mahāsamudramavatīrṇā dhanahārakāḥ |
divy23:77: te devatāyācanaṁ kartumārabdhāh—yo ’smin mahāsamudre devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā prativasati, sa ācakṣatu kiṁ mṛgayatīti |
divy23:79: te kathayati—āryasaṁgharakṣito ’smākaṁ vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṁśukrīḍanako bhadantaśāriputreṇānupradattako bhagavatānuparītakaḥ |
divy23:80: śreyo ’smākamanenaiva sārdhaṁ kālatriyā, na tvena vayaṁ saṁgharakṣitaṁ parityakṣyāmaḥ |
divy23:82: sa kathayati—bhavantaḥ, kiṁ kathayante? kathayanti—ārya saṁgharakṣita mahāsamudrācchabdo niścaritah—āryasaṁgharakṣitamasmākamanuprayacchatheti |
divy23:83: sa kathayati—kasmānnānuprayacchadhvam? te kathayanti—ārya, tvamasmākaṁ vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṁśukrīḍanakaḥ |
divy23:86: na tveva vayamārya saṁgharakṣita tvāṁ parityakṣyāmaḥ |
divy23:87: āyuṣmān saṁgharakṣitaḥ saṁlakṣayati—yaduktaṁ bhagavatā bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā te bhavitavyamitīdaṁ tat |
divy23:88: sa pātracīvaraṁ gṛhītvā ātmānaṁ mahāsamudre prakṣeptumārabdhaḥ |
divy23:90: te kathayanti—āryasaṁgharakṣita kiṁ karoṣi, āryasaṁgharakṣita kiṁ karoṣīti |
divy23:95: ārya saṁgharakṣita, iyaṁ vipaśyitaḥ samyaksambuddhasya gandhakuṭī |
divy23:96: iyaṁ śikhino viśvabhuvaḥ krakucchandasya kanakamuneḥ kāśyapasyeyaṁ bhagavato gandhakuṭī |
divy23:97: ārya saṁgharakṣita, bhagavataḥ sūtraṁ mātṛkā ca devamanuṣyeṣu pratiṣṭhitam |
divy23:99: aho bata, āryaḥ saṁghāṁ rakṣita ihāpyāgamacatuṣṭayaṁ pratiṣṭhāpayet |
divy23:107: tatraikaścakṣuṣī nimīliyatvodveśaṁ gṛhṇāti, dvitīyaḥ pṛṣṭhatomukha uddeśaṁ gṛhṇāti, tṛtīyo dūrataḥ sthitvoddeśaṁ gṛhṇāti |
divy23:108: sa eva teṣāmekaḥ sagauravaḥ sapratīśa iti karaṇīyaiśca sarvatra pūrvaṁgamaḥ |
divy23:109: ārya uttiṣṭha, dantakāṣṭha, dantakāṣṭhaṁ visarjaya, bhagavato maṇḍalakamāmārjaya, caityābhivandanaṁ kuru, bhuṅkṣva, śayyāṁ kalpayeti |
divy23:112: kiṁ dhārayiṣyanti āhosvinnadhārayiṣyanti? sa kathayati—smṛtimattakā hyete dhārayiṣyanti, api tu doṣo ’styeṣām |
divy23:113: sa kathayati—ārya, ko doṣah? sarve hyete ’gauravā apratīśāḥ |
divy23:114: ekastāvaccakṣuṣī nimīlayitvodveśaṁ gṛhṇāti, dvitīyaḥ pṛṣṭatomukha uddeśaṁ gṛhṇāti, tṛtīyo dūrataḥ sthitvoddeśaṁ gṛhṇāti |
divy23:115: tvamevaikaḥ sagauravaḥ sapratīśa iti karaṇīyaiśca sarvatra pūrvaṁgamaḥ |
divy23:117: yastāvadayaṁ cakṣuṣī nimīlayitvoddeśaṁ gṛhṇāti, ayaṁ dṛṣṭiviṣaḥ |
divy23:118: yo ’pyayaṁ pṛṣṣṭhatomukha uddeśaṁ gṛhṇāti, eṣo ’pi śvāsaviṣaḥ |
divy23:119: yo ’pyeṣa dūrataḥ sthitvoddeśaṁ gṛhṇāti, eṣo ’pi sparśaviṣaḥ |
divy23:121: sa bhīta utpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukaḥ kṛśāluko durbalako mlānako ’prāptakāyaḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy23:122: sa kathayati—ārya, kasmāt tvamutpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukaḥ kṛśāluko durbalako mlānako ’prāptakāyaḥ saṁvṛttah? sa kathayati—bhadramukha, amitramadhye ’haṁ vāsaṁ kalpayāmi |
divy23:123: sacet yuṣmākamanyatamo ’nyatamaṁ prakupyeta, māṁ nāmāvaśeṣaṁ kuryāt |
divy23:125: api tu icchasi tvaṁ jambudvīpaṁ gantum? bhadramukha, icchāmi |
divy23:135: te ’nupūrveṇa samudratīraṁ gatvā sarve te vaṇijaḥ śayitāḥ |
divy23:144: te kathayanti prabhātāyāṁ rajanyām—kutrāyaṁ saṁgharakṣitah? tatraika evamāhuh—purastādgacchati |
divy23:149: āryasaṁgharakṣito bhavanto maharddhiko mahānubhāvo yaḥ samudramadhye na kālagataḥ |
divy23:150: sa idānīṁ kālaṁ kariṣyati? sthānametadvidyate yadasau agrata eva yāsyati |
divy23:154: āyuṣmānapi saṁgharakṣitaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanasamaye sūryāṁśubhistāḍitaḥ pratibuddho yāvanna kiṁcitpaśyati |
divy23:157: yāvadanyatamasyāṁ sālāṭavyāṁ vihāraṁ paśyatyudgataṁ mañcapīṭhavedikājālavātāyanagavākṣaparimaṇḍitam, bhikṣūṁśca saṁprāvṛtān saṁpracchannāñ śānteneryāpathenāvasthitān |
divy23:161: viśrāmayitvā vihāraṁ praveśito yāvat paśyati śobhanāṁ śayanāsanaprajñaptiṁ kṛtāṁ praṇītaṁ cāhāramupahṛtam |
divy23:162: sa tairuktah—bhadanta saṁgharakṣita, mā tṛṣito ’si, mā bubhukṣito ’si? kathayati—āryāḥ, tṛṣito ’smi, bubhukṣito ’smi |
divy23:165: te kathayanti—bhadanta saṁgharakṣita, muṅkṣva, ādīnavo ’tra bhaviṣyati |
divy23:172: taistāvadayomudgaraiḥ parasparamārtasvaraṁ krandadbhiḥ śirāṁsi bhagnāni, yāvat kālādakālībhūtam |
divy23:173: tataḥ paścāt punarapi teṣāṁ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, te ca bhikṣavaḥ śānteneryāpathenāvasthitāḥ |
divy23:175: ke yūyamāyuṣmantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh? bhadanta saṁgharakṣita, duṣkuhakā jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ |
divy23:177: sa kathayati—ahaṁ pratyakṣadarśī, kasmānnābhiśraddadhāsye? te kathayanti—bhadanta saṁgharakṣita, vayaṁ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan |
divy23:179: te vayaṁ bhaktāgre raṇamutpādayitvā iha pratyekanarakeṣūpapannāḥ |
divy23:181: sādhu saṁgharakṣita, jambudvīpaṁ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmārocaya—mā āyuṣmantaḥ saṁghamadhye raṇamutpādayiṣyatha |
divy23:182: mā asyaivamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhāgino bhaviṣyatha tadyathā śramaṇāḥ kāśyapīyāḥ |
divy23:185: yāvat paśyati dvitīyaṁ vihāramudgataṁ mañcapīṭhavedikājālavātāyanaparikṣiptaṁ gavakṣaparimaṇḍitaṁ bhikṣūṁśca suprāvṛtān supraticchannāñ śāntāñ śānteryāpathe vyavasthitān |
divy23:190: śobhanāṁ śayanāsanaprajñaptiḥ kṛtvā praṇītaṁ cāhāraṁ samanvāhṛtya sa tairuktah—bhadanta saṁgharakṣita muṅkṣva |
divy23:196: tairātasvaraṁ krandadbhistāvadayorasena parasparamātmā sikto yāvat kāladakālībhūtam |
divy23:197: tataḥ paścāt punarapi sa teṣāṁ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ |
divy23:198: te ca bhikṣavaḥ punarapi śāntāḥ śānteryāpathenāvasthitāḥ |
divy23:199: sa teṣāṁ sakāśamupasaṁkrāntah—ke yūyamāyuṣmantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh? duṣkuhakā bhadanta saṁgharakṣita jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ, nābhiśraddaddhāsyanti |
divy23:200: sa kathayati—ahaṁ pratyakṣadarśī, kasmānnābhiśraddadhāsye? te kathayanti—bhadanta saṁgharakṣita, vayaṁ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan |
divy23:201: saṁghasya ca snehalābhe saṁpanne āgantukā bhikṣava āgatāḥ |
divy23:202: tairasmābhiranāryaparigṛhītairevaṁ cittamutpāditam—na tāvadbhojayiṣyāmo yāvadete āgantukā bhikṣavo na prakrāntā bhaviṣyantīti |
divy23:208: sādhu bhadanta saṁgharakṣita, jambudvīpaṁ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmāraocaya—mā āyuṣmantaḥ śraddhādeyaṁ vinipātayiṣyatha, mā asya evamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhāgino bhaviṣyatha, tadyathā brāhmaṇāḥ kāśyapīyāḥ |
divy23:210: sa saṁprasthito yāvat paśyati tṛtīyaṁ vihāramudgataṁ mañcapīṭhavidikājālavātāyanagavākṣaparimaṇḍitaṁ pūrvavadyāvadāyuṣmān saṁgharakṣito saṁgharakṣito bhuktvā ekānte ’pakramyāvsthitaḥ |
divy23:212: sa tena vihāra ādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ saṁprajvalita ekajvālībhūto dhmāyitumārabdhaḥ |
divy23:214: tataḥ paścāt punarapi teṣāṁ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, te ca bhikṣavaḥ śāntaśānteneryāpathenāvasthitāḥ |
divy23:215: sa teṣāṁ sakāśamupasaṁkrāntah—ke yūyamāyuṣmantaḥ, kena vā karmaṇā ihopapannāh? duṣkuhakā bhadanta saṁgharakṣita jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ, nābhiśraddadhāsyasi |
divy23:216: sa kathayati—ahaṁ pratyakṣadarśī, kasmānnābhiśraddadhāsye? te kathayanti—bhadanta saṁgharakṣita vayaṁ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan |
divy23:222: sa tatraiva sthito yāvat tasyānisaṅgena(?) punarapi bahavaḥ śīlavanto bhikṣava āgatāḥ |
divy23:224: tairasmābhiramarṣajātaiḥ śuṣkāni kāṣṭhāni śuṣkāni tṛṇāni śuṣkāni gomayāni upasaṁhṛtya tasmin vihāro ’gnirdagdhaḥ |
divy23:226: te vayaṁ śaikṣāśaikṣān pudgalān dagdhvā iha pratyekanarakeṣūpapannāḥ |
divy23:228: sādhu bhadanta saṁgharakṣita, jambudvīpaṁ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmārocaya—mā āyuṣmantaḥ sabrahmacāriṇāmantike praduṣṭacittamutpādayiṣyatha, mā asyaivamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhagino bhavino bhaviṣyatha tadyathā śramaṇaḥ kāśyapīyāḥ |
divy23:230: āyuṣmān saṁgharakṣitaḥ saṁprasthito yāvat sattvānadrakṣīt stambhākārān kuḍyākārān vṛkṣākārān patrākārān puṣpākārān phalākārān rajjvākārān saṁmārjanyākārānudūkhalākārān khaṭvākārān sthālikākārān |
divy23:235: te kathayanti—bhavantaḥ, kriyākāraṁ tāvat kurmah—bahubollakāḥ śramaṇāḥ śākyaputrīyā bhavanti |
divy23:242: kathayati—kim yuṣmākaṁ pratiśrayaṁ na dīyate? api tu yuṣmākaṁ doṣo ’sti |
divy23:244: samayenāhaṁ bhavataḥ pratiśrayaṁ dāsye, sacet kiṁcinna mantrayasi |
divy23:249: āyuṣmatā saṁgharakṣitena sā kuṭikā siktā saṁmṛṣṭā saṁmārjitā sukumārīṁ gomayakāsiṁ cānupradattā |
divy23:251: te kathayati—bhadanta, śucyapi mārjantyete śramaṇāḥ śākyaputrīyāḥ |
divy23:252: āyuṣmān saṁgharakṣito bahiḥ kuṭikāyāḥ pādau prakṣālya kuṭikāṁ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṁ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṁ smṛtimupashtāpya |
divy23:253: ya tasminnāśramapade devatā prativasati, sā rātryāḥ prathame yāme yenāyuṣmān saṁgharakṣitastenopasaṁkrāntā |
divy23:256: na paśyasi mayā triyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṁ labdham, kiṁ niṣkāsāpayitumicchasi? sā saṁlakṣayati—śrāntakāyo ’yam, svapitu |
divy23:261: na paśyasi mayā kriyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṁ labdham? kiṁ niṣkāsāpayitumicchasi? sā saṁlakṣayati—śrāntakāyo ’yam, svapitu |
divy23:266: na paśyasi mayā kriyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṁ labdham? kiṁ niṣkāsāpayitumicchasi? sā kathayati—ārya saṁgharakṣita, prabhātamidānīm |
divy23:268: api tu nanūktaṁ bhagavatā bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā te bhavitavyamiti |
divy23:269: āyuṣmān saṁgharakṣitaḥ saṁlakṣayati—śobhanaṁ kathayati—sacet sa niṣkāsayiṣyati, gamiṣyāmi |
divy23:271: brāhmaṇapratisamyuktaṁ bhāṣayāmītyāyuṣmān saṁgharakṣito brāhmaṇavargaṁ svādhyāyitumārabdhah— na nagnacaryā na jaṭā na paṅko nānāśanaṁ sthaṇḍalaśāyikā vā |
divy23:273: alaṁkṛtaścāpi careta dharmaṁ dāntendrayaḥ śāntaḥ samyato brahmacārī |
divy23:274: sarveṣu bhūteṣu nidhāya daṇḍaṁ sa brāhmaṇaḥ sa śramaṇa sa bhikṣuḥ (3)|
divy23:277: ityeka upasaṁkrānto dvitīyastṛtīyo yāvat sarve upasaṁkrāntāḥ |
divy23:278: tathā tayā devatayā adhiṣṭhitam, yathā parasparaṁ na paśyanti |
divy23:280: gāthāṁ ca bhāṣate— yānīha bhūtāni samāgatāni sthitāni bhūmyāmathavāntarikṣe |
divy23:281: kurvantu maitrīṁ satataṁ prajāsu divā ca rātrau ca carantu dharmam (4)|
divy23:290: te dṛṣṭasatyāḥ kathayanti—labhemo vayaṁ bhadanta saṁgharakṣita svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy23:292: āyuṣmān saṁgharakṣitaḥ kathayati—kiṁ matsakāśe pravrajatha, āhosvidbhagavatah? te kathayanti—bhagavataḥ |
divy23:293: āyuṣmān saṁgharakṣitaḥ kathayati—yadyevam, āgacchatha, bhagavataḥ sakāśaṁ gacchāmaḥ |
divy23:294: te kathayanti—bhadanta saṁgharakṣita, kimasmadīyayā ṛddhyā gacchāmaḥ, āhosvit tvadīyayā? āyuṣmān saṁgharakṣitaḥ saṁlakṣayati—ebhirmadīyenāvavādenaivaṁvidhā guṇagaṇā aghigatāḥ, ahaṁ laṅghanakopamaḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy23:296: āyuṣmān saṁgharakṣito ’nyatamaṁ vṛkṣamūlaṁ niśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṁ kāyaṁ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṁ smṛtimupasthāpya |
divy23:298: dhātukuśalo bhavati, pratītyasamutpādakuśalo bhavati, sthānāsthānakuśalo bhavati, aparapratibaddhā cāsya bhavati avavādānuśāsanīti |
divy23:301: te āyuṣmatā saṁgharakṣitenābhihitāh—bhavantaḥ, gṛhṇīdhvaṁ madīyaṁ cīvarakarṇikam, yāsyāmaḥ |
divy23:303: athāyuṣmān saṁgharakṣito vitatapakṣa iva haṁsarājastata eva ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā prakrāntaḥ |
divy23:305: yāvat tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni bhāṇḍaṁ pratisāmayanti |
divy23:309: kutra gacchasi? sa kathayati—imāni pañca kulaputraśatānyākāṅkṣanti svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy23:316: tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṁ deśayati |
divy23:318: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—eṣa bhikṣuvaḥ saṁgharakṣito bhikṣuḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati |
divy23:321: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy23:322: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān saṁgharakṣito bhagavantamidamavocat—idaṁ bhadanta kulaputrasahasramākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy23:324: te bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitāh—eta bhikṣuvaścarata brahmacaryam |
divy23:325: bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ saṁghāṭīprāvṛtāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravaḥ pātrakarakavyagrahastā varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitāḥ |
divy23:327: ehīti caoktā hi tathāgatena muṇḍāśca saṁghāṭiparītadehāḥ |
divy23:328: sadyaḥ praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṁ sthitā buddhamanorathena (5)|
divy23:331: arhantaḥ saṁvṛttāstraidhātukavītarāgāḥ pūrvavadyāvat pūjyāśca abhivādyāśca saṁvṛttāḥ |
divy23:333: āyuṣmān saṁgharakṣito buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ pṛcchati—ihāhaṁ bhadanta sattvānadrākṣaṁ kuḍyākārān stambhākārān vṛkṣākārān patrākārān puṣpākārān phalākārāan rajjvākārān saṁmārjanyākārān khaṭvākārānudūkhalākārān sthālikākārān |
divy23:335: kasya karmaṇo vipākena? bhagavānāha—yāṁstvaṁ saṁgharakṣita sattvānadrākṣīḥ kuḍyākārāṁste kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan |
divy23:336: taiḥ sāṁghikaṁ kuḍyaṁ śleṣmāṇā siṁhāṇakena vināśitam |
divy23:337: te tasya karmaṇo vipākena kuḍyākārāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ |
divy23:339: yān saṁgharakṣita sattvānādrākṣīrvṛkṣākārāṁste kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan |
divy23:340: taiḥ sāṁghikāḥ puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāḥ paudgalikaparibhogena bhuktāḥ |
divy23:341: te tasya karmaṇo vipākena vṛkṣākārāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ |
divy23:342: yathā vṛkṣākārāḥ, evaṁ patrākārāaḥ phalākārāḥ puṣpākārāḥ |
divy23:343: yaṁ tvaṁ saṁgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣī rajjvākāram, sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvaka āsīt |
divy23:345: sa tasy karmaṇo saṁgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣīstapvākāram (?) kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvaka āsīt śrāmaṇerakaḥ |
divy23:348: sa taiḥ pṛṣṭah—śrāmaṇeraka, kiṁ saṁghasya pānakaṁ bhaviṣyati? sa kathayati—nāstīti |
divy23:351: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena tapvākāraḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy23:352: yaṁ tvaṁ saṁgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣīrudūkhalākāram, sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvaka āsīt |
divy23:355: sa tenoktah—śrāmaṇeraka, dadasva me khalastokaṁ kuṭṭayitvā |
divy23:359: so ’marṣajātaḥ kathayati—śrāmaṇeraka, yadi rocate, tvāmevāhamasminn udūkhale prakṣipya kuṭṭaye prāgeva khalastokam |
divy23:360: yattadarhato ’ntike kharaṁ vākkarma niścāritam, sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena udūkhalākāraḥ saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy23:361: yāṁstvaṁ saṁgharakṣita sattvānadrākṣīḥ sthālyākārāṁste kāśyapasya samyaksambbuddhasya kalpikārakā āsan |
divy23:362: te bhikṣūṇāṁ bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayamānāḥ sthālikāṁ bhañjate |
divy23:364: te tasya karmaṇo vipākena sthālyākārāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ |
divy23:365: yaṁ tvaṁ saṁgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣīrmadhye chinnastantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati, sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajita āsīllābhagrāhikaḥ |
divy23:366: tena yadvārṣikaṁ lābhaṁ tad dhaimantikaṁ pariṇāmitam, yaddhaimantikaṁ tadvārṣikam |
divy23:367: tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnastantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati |
